configfiles.configfile:
mono <- read.delim("$input_mono", sep="\t") #if $input_iso iso <- read.delim("$input_iso", sep="\t") #end if SN = $sn_ratio * $kmdn
MF_assign <- MFAssignR::MFAssign( peaks = mono, #if $input_iso isopeaks = iso, #end if ionMode = "$ionmode", lowMW = $lowMW, highMW = $highMW, ppm_err = $ppm_err, SN = SN )
write.table(MF_assign[['Unambig']], file = '$Unambig', row.names= FALSE) write.table(MF_assign[['Ambig']], file = '$Ambig', row.names= FALSE) write.table(MF_assign[['None']], file = '$None', row.names= FALSE)
dir.create("plots") ggplot2::ggsave(filename = file.path("plots", "msassign.png"), MF_assign[['MSAssign']]) ggplot2::ggsave(filename = file.path("plots", "errorMZ.png"), MF_assign[['Error']]) ggplot2::ggsave(filename = file.path("plots", "MSgroups.png"), MF_assign[['MSgroups']]) ggplot2::ggsave(filename = file.path("plots", "VK.png"), MF_assign[['VK']])
